name: Out Of Sight (mschiller)
description:
One morning. One person. One fate: Darkness, plain Darkness.

You wake up one day to complete darkness, as is if somebody just switched off the lights. You simply cannot see the figurative hands in front of your eyes. When you went to bed, everything seemed so normal. But what happened then...?
Are your lights broken?
Have you forgotten to pay your power bill?
Has something caused a short circuit?
You better check. Or, at least, you try to... After all, you are not blind - right? This could never ever happen to you. Not you. How could it. You have never thought about the daily struggles of a blind woman, have you? Can you imagine yourself being blind? Proof yourself and the world what you can do despite your handicap!
